entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@vonderleyen @Hallaschka_HH @DrTedros @WHO @melindagates @Lagarde @YoYo_Ma @jensspahn And now additionally please wear a #facemask!
Though it doesn't protect yourself from infections, wearing a mask prevents infecting others, especially when you're not aware of any own infection.
And if everyone wears a #mask, everyone would be protected!
#facemasks
#coronavirus
